plot: Hex is after the Fountain of Youth. Grandpa Max and Ben both experience the effects of its waters. They have to stop Hex from getting to the Fountain and regaining his youth and full powers.

As Hex seeks the famous Fountain of Youth to restore his youth and thereby his magic, the Tennysons happen upon its presence by accident. Grandpa Max falls into a vat of it at a fair, splashing Ben. While their physical ages revert, so do their mental and behavioral ages, with Grandpa Max wanting to goof around all day while Ben becomes a whiny brat in need of a nap (with all his Omnitrix aliens becoming crabby little kids as well). Will it be enough to stop Hex from gaining the fountain?—statmanjeff
